

=====================================================

Wolf [3D Model]   < Ver 1.0 >

=====================================================






----------------------------------------------------
Includes 11 Animations
----------------------------------------------------


> Idle01

> Idle02

> Run

> Dash

> Attack01

> Attack02

> Skill01

> Skill02

> Stun

> Damage

> Die





===================================================


=================================================== 

instructions

===================================================


1.click to the  [File] > [Open Project] > [Wolf] folder

2.Dubble click [Demo_scene] and Use Prefap file in the [Prefaps] folder

3.you can use the model file ~  Too easy~~~



Enjoy!! Cool Guys!!
